value.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
value.author: Steve Jobs

value.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
value.author: Steve Jobs

value.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
value.author: Winston Churchill

value.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
value.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

value.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
value.author: Aristotle

value.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
value.author: Oscar Wilde

value.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
value.author: Albert Einstein

value.quote: So many books, so little time.
value.author: Frank Zappa

value.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
value.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

value.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
value.author: Mae West
